lines.text: Let's see, flying rubber... Flubber!
Corners beautifully, doesn't it?
I'm an American! See it? My credit cards!
There's nothing in the rule book that says one team can't jump higher than the other.
Oh, it's just Neddy the Nut out flying his old Model T.
Substance X, we dub thee... Flubber!
Mr. Hawk, let me get this straight. You want me to turn my discovery over to you so you can blackmail our government?
Medfield College can grow and prosper, or it can wither and die on the vine. That's entirely up to you.
[Prof. Brainard has repeatedly slammed his Flubberized Model T down on Prof. Ashton's car roof while in motion, causing to go out of control and crash into a police car]

[as he and the two officers get out of their crashed cars]
Officer! Help me! It's after me! Help me!

[his face and suit covered in hot coffee thanks to the crash]
I do hope that you will excuse my appearance, but I was just having a cup of *boiling hot coffee*.
But it's after me!
What's after you?
I don't know, some kind of a... thing!
A thing? Can you describe it?

I don't know. I didn't see it. But it flies. And it made a noise, like, uh, "Aaa-OOO-gah! Aaa-OOO-gah!" And then it banged down on the top of my car! BOOM, BOOM, BOOM! And when I looked, there wasn't anything there!
Oh, that kind of a thing.
I'm a desperate man, Charlie, and desperate men do desperate things.
[the fire crew has arrived to rescue Alonzo Hawk, who is now bouncing out of control]

[shouting through megaphone]
Mr. Hawk! This is the Fire Chief speaking! We'll have everything under control in just a moment. Now Mr. Hawk, try to relax.
Relax? How can I relax, you fat-head?
[the fire crew's net had been accidentally broken by Alonzo Hawk during their attempt to rescue him]
I told you we needed a new one.
You told me? What do you think I've been telling the town council? How am I supposed to buy a new net without an appropriation?
Well, don't get hot. I only mentioned it.
Well, you just keep the kinks out of the fire hose. That's all I want from you. I'm the Chief!
